PHRASE.LANG: 侍のカツラ（武士・男性）
A men's hairstyle during the Edo period. Hair on the top of the head is shaved and the remaining hair on both sides is tied up into a topknot called “chonmage”. [#Legal]
江戸時代の男性の髪型のひとつ。頭頂部の髪を剃り上げ、側頭部の髪を集めて結った丁髷（ちょんまげ）のカツラ。[#Legal]
에도시대의 남성의 머리 모양 중 하나. 앞머리를 자른 후, 옆머리를 모아 올려 상투를 틀었다.[#Legal]
A men's hairstyle during the Edo period. Hair on the top of the head is shaved and the remaining hair on both sides is tied up into a topknot called “chonmage”. [#Legal]
江戶時代的男性髮型之一。剃掉頭頂的頭髮，再將側面的頭髮束成「丁髷」（頭髻的一種）的髮型。[#Legal]
江戶時代的男性髮型之一。剃掉頭頂的頭髮，再將側面的頭髮束成「丁髷」（頭髻的一種）的髮型。[#Legal]
A men's hairstyle during the Edo period. Hair on the top of the head is shaved and the remaining hair on both sides is tied up into a topknot called “chonmage”. [#Legal]
